text: @realDonaldTrump No where in the world has as many Coronavirus cases as the USA with 819,805 cases, 27,046 new cases, 45,318 deaths, 2,804 new deaths! You have always wanted big # and now you have them! With you in the WH the US has led the World in Coronavirus infection! https://t.co/FBGWJUCaUY
